H0.text: What is the name of the spiritual leader of a community of Zen Buddhist monks. Sensei

H1.text: What is the name of the spiritual leader of a community of Zen Buddhist monks. Abbot

H2.text: What is the name of the spiritual leader of a community of Zen Buddhist monks. Bhikkhu

H3.text: What is the name of the spiritual leader of a community of Zen Buddhist monks. Roshi

A4.text: An abbot is the head and chief governor of a community of monks
